entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a house-elf who works for Mr. Crouch and is struggling to adjust to her newfound freedom.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is Winky's former master and a good wizard according to Winky.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is friends with Harry Potter and provides him with information about the wizarding world.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is a wise and powerful wizard who has told Dobby that he does not insist upon house-elves keeping secrets and remaining silent.

relationships.description: Winky used to work for Mr. Crouch, but is now free.
Professor Dumbledore has advised Dobby on how house-elves should behave.
